summary: The Mystery Gang reunite and visit Moonscar Island, a remote island with a dark secret. Daphne wants more than just a villain in a costume, and they get more than they ever expected.
cast: Scott Innes|Billy West|Mary Kay Bergman|Frank Welker|B.J. Ward|Adrienne Barbeau|Tara Strong|Cam Clarke|Jim Cummings|Mark Hamill|Jennifer Leigh Warren|Ed Gilbert
title: Scooby-Doo on Zombie Island
